usage.cn: 思念是一条细长的线，一端系着你，一端系着我，时刻连接着两颗跳动不息的心。
usage.eng: Thinking of each other is just like a thread connecting both you on the one end and me on the other end.

usage.cn: 要知道只有一样东西能予人生以价值，就是为数不多的时候，能够真正的和另一个人心灵相契。
usage.eng: You know the only thing that has made the whole thing worthwhile, has been those few times that I was really, truly connect with another person.
